mapper.sql: id, create_date, title, logo, hold_date, hold_address, remarks
mapper.select:
select
from bird_meeting where 1 = 1
and title like '%${title}%'
mapper.insert: insert into bird_meeting (id, create_date, title, logo, hold_date, hold_address, remarks, welcome_speech) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{holdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{holdAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{welcomeSpeech,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

id,

remarks,

mapper.update:
update bird_meeting
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hold_date = #{holdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
hold_address = #{holdAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
welcome_speech = #{welcomeSpeech,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
